annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I am creating an original cocktail after a movie that I absolutely love in the Princess Bride. The drink I will be making is...
annotations.title: The Princess Bride's "Miracle Pill" | How to Drink

textContent:
.5oz Amaretto
.5oz Bénédictine
1oz Bourbon
1oz Cognac
2.5oz Cold Brew Coffee
1 Egg white

Dry Shake then shake with ice
Garnish with an Orange Twist & Fresh Grated Dark Chocolate

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3pHHbE3Pc5I&t=3s
title: Miracle Pill
